Item.name: Abnormality Lure
Item.description: A terminal that allows for a direct uplink with Coalition Central Command, who can coordinate bait to lure certain monsters to the area - for a price.

Item.name: Black Gate
Item.description: This Enkephalin-powered portal is one-way: nothing can enter, but things can be brought here from the other side. Exercise caution.

Item.name: Enkephalin Processor
Item.description: A machine designed to process Enkephalin-related items.

Item.name: Containment Chamber
Item.description: A durable containment cell designed to hold and perform works with Abnormality Eggs to generate Enkephalin.

Item.name: [ZAYIN] Blubbering Toad (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This strange egg seems to be.. Sad. If it is not contained, it will eventually hatch into a Blubbering Toad.

Item.name: [ZAYIN] Blubbering Toad
Item.description: glupo :)

Item.name: [ZAYIN] One Sin
Item.description: Summons One Sin and Hundreds of Good Deeds, a beneficial ZAYIN-grade Abnormality.

Item.name: [ZAYIN] One Sin (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This egg forgives your sins. If it is not contained, it will eventually hatch into One Sin.

Item.name: [TETH] Small Bird (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: A large mouth protrudes from this 'egg'. If it is not contained, it will eventually hatch into a Small Bird.

Item.name: [TETH] Punishing Bird
Item.description: Summons Punishing Bird, a beneficial TETH-grade Abnormality.

Item.name: [TETH] Forsaken Murderer
Item.description: Summons Forsaken Murderer, a hostile TETH-grade Abnormality.

Item.name: [TETH] Forsaken Murderer (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This egg seems to be made entirely out of solid metal. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Forsaken Murderer.

Item.name: [TETH] Corroded Inquisitor
Item.description: Summons Corroded Inquisitors, hostile TETH-grade Corrosions.

Item.name: [TETH] So That No One Will Cry (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This splintered wooden egg is covered in cursed talismans. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into So That No One Will Cry.

Item.name: [TETH] So That No One Will Cry
Item.description: Summons STNOWC, a wooden doll that deals mostly blunt and Rupture damage.

Item.name: [TETH] Drenched Gossypium (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This flowered egg is soaked with human blood. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Drenched Gossypium.

Item.name: [TETH] Drenched Gossypium
Item.description: Summons Drenched Gossypium, a hostile TETH-grade Abnormality.

Item.name: [TETH] Amber Dawn
Item.description: Summons the Amber Dawn ordeal. These small worms are protected by tough shells but are otherwise fragile, and can be harvested for basic organic resources.

Item.name: [HE] Headless Ichthys (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This fishy egg seems to hold a sac of blue fluid. If kept underwater, it will eventually hatch into a Headless Ichthys.

Item.name: [HE] Der Fluchschütze (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This burning egg seems shell-shocked, somehow. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Der Fluchschütze.

Item.name: [HE] KQE-1J-23 (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This cybernetic egg seems to be making idle calculations. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into KQE-1J-23.

Item.name: [HE] KQE-1J-23
Item.description: Summons KQE-1J-23, a humanoid amalgamation of flesh and circuits.

Item.name: [HE] Wayward Passenger (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This horribly warped egg is much older than it seems. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Wayward Passenger.

Item.name: [HE] Wayward Passenger
Item.description: Summons Wayward Passenger, a dimension-hopping mutated human.

Item.name: [HE] Der Freischütz (Hostile)
Item.description: Summons Der Freischutz, a rifle-toting mercenary. This spawns him as an enemy.

Item.name: [HE] Der Freischütz (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This burning egg houses a devil. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Der Freischütz.

Item.name: [HE] Der Freischütz (Hired)
Item.description: Summons Der Freischutz, a rifle-toting mercenary. This spawns him as an ally.

Item.name: [HE] Der Fluchschütze (Hostile)
Item.description: Summons Der Fluchschütze, a shotgun-toting mercenary, as an enemy.

Item.name: [WAW] Dream-Devouring Siltcurrent (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This smooth egg seems to hold a sac of glowing fluid. If kept underwater, it will eventually hatch into a Dream-Devouring Siltcurrent.

Item.name: [WAW] Dream-Devouring Siltcurrent
Item.description: Summons the Dream-Devouring Siltcurrent.

Item.name: [WAW] Dream-Devouring Siltcurrent (Pet)
Item.description: Summons the Dream-Devouring Siltcurrent in a weaker, friendly form.

Item.name: [WAW] The King in Binds
Item.description: Summons The King in Binds.

Item.name: [WAW] The King in Binds (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This egg is tightly bound, or is it bandages?. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into The King in Binds.

Item.name: [WAW] Amber Dusk
Item.description: Summons the Amber Dusk ordeal. These large worms are protected by tough shells, and will summon weaker worms to aid them if not quickly eliminated.

Item.name: [WAW] Spiral of Contempt (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This gilded egg seems to be looking down on you, even now. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Spiral of Contempt.

Item.name: [WAW] Spiral of Contempt
Item.description: Summons Spiral of Contempt, a statue-like Abnormality with the ability to paralyze people with summoned statues.

Item.name: [WAW] Burrowing Heaven
Item.description: Summons Burrowing Heaven, a fleshy tree that embodies eldritch horror.

Item.name: [WAW] The Naked Nest
Item.description: Summons The Naked Nest, a fleshy hive of parasitic worms.

Item.name: [WAW] The Naked Nest (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This fleshy egg is so slick, it's hard to hold onto. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into The Naked Nest.

Item.name: [ALEPH] Nothing There (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This egg is made of what looks like human flesh. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Nothing There.

Item.name: [ALEPH] Nothing There
Item.description: Summons Nothing There, a monster that tries to mimic human behavior.

Item.name: [ALEPH] Meat Doggy (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This egg is made of what looks like human flesh. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into the friendly Meat Doggy.

Item.name: [ALEPH] Meat Doggy
Item.description: nothing there?! nothing there! !! ! o my gosh meat doggy

Item.name: [ALEPH] Blue Star
Item.description: Summons Blue Star, a singularity full of human legs.

Item.name: [ALEPH] Blue Star (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: This isn't a statue, it's a dormant god. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into Blue Star.

Item.name: [ALEPH] CENSORED
Item.description: Summons CENSORED, a CENSORED.

Item.name: [ALEPH] CENSORED (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: You can't perceive whatever this horrible THING is. If not contained, it will eventually hatch into CENSORED.

Item.name: [ALEPH] Apocalypse Bird
Item.description: Summons Apocalypse Bird.

Item.name: [ALEPH] Apocalypse Bird (Abnormality Egg)
Item.description: Don't let it hatch.
